text: "Paga de Solteiro Feliz" () is a song by the Brazilian duo Simone & Simaria featuring the Brazilian DJ Alok. The song was released on January 5, 2018, produced by Alok, exploring the mix of sertanejo, principal genre of Simone & Simaria, with electronic music, genre of Alok. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2018) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Billboard Brasil Hot 100 (Brazil) | 12 |- |} ==References== Category:2018 singles Category:Alok (DJ) songs Category:2018 songs
title: Paga de Solteiro Feliz
